alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Saline County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1059 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salina. This storm was nearly stationary or drifting slowly south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Smolan, Kipp and Salina Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 86 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 244 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
